features: SMOOTH SHAMPOO: This award-winning formula helps to add softness and shape to curly, wavy and frizzy hair types. It contains Coconut Oil, Shea Butter and Vitamin E to leave hair soft, shiny and frizz-free.

SALON-QUALITY: Our modern formulas are dermatologically tested, PH-balanced, and free from SLS, parabens and phthalates. We instead use natural ingredients such as shea butter, coconut oil, rice protein and vitamin E to nourish and restore.

AWARD-WINNING: Our range of Shampoo and Conditioner has 11 major beauty awards and counting, including a Cosmopolitan 2021 Holy Grail Beauty Award, Glamour 2021 Beauty Award, Cosmopolitan 2021 Beauty Award, and an InStyle 2022 Best Beauty Buy Award.

CERTIFIED CRUELTY-FREE: All of MONDAY’s products are approved as cruelty-free under the Leaping Bunny programme by Cruelty Free International. We’re also proud to be recognised by PETA as a brand that does not test on animals.

100% RECYCLABLE BOTTLES: Not only do our little pink bottles look great in your shower, they’re made from 100% recyclable plastic to help minimise carbon footprint and reduce landfill. A win for your hair and for the environment.
body.description: MONDAY Haircare SMOOTH Shampoo for women is good for frizzy and unmanageable hair and curly and wavy hair types. It’s also safe for color-treated hair. This defrizzing Shampoo helps to soften and smooth hair with Coconut Oil, Shea Butter and Vitamin E—ingredients that help support hair health and maintain normal hair growth and thickness. For best results, use with MONDAY Haircare SMOOTH Conditioner. MONDAY Haircare’s salon-quality Shampoo and Conditioner formulas are dermatologically tested, PH-balanced, and free from SLS, parabens and phthalates. They instead contain premium natural ingredients such as shea butter, coconut oil, rice protein, vitamin E and provitamin B5 to nourish and restore. Our range of Shampoo and Conditioner has close to a dozen major beauty awards, including a Cosmopolitan 2021 Holy Grail Beauty Award, Glamour 2021 Beauty Award, Cosmopolitan 2021 Beauty Award, and an InStyle 2022 Best Beauty Buy Award. MONDAY has also been featured by Vogue, ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, Allure, Refinery29 and Byrdie. All of MONDAY’s products are approved as cruelty-free under the Leaping Bunny programme. We’re also proud to be recognised by PETA as a brand that does not test on animals. Our pink bottles are also made from 100% recyclable plastic to help minimise carbon footprint and reduce landfill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Price for what it is
reviews.reviewText: According to research from EWG.ORG it scores a 5 of 10. 10 being bad 0 being great an EWG no harmful ingredients.I used this once & it does have better scores then some high end brands. However the irritants are in Allergies & Immunotoxicity. So this Combo of Shampoo & Conditioner may not be for you.The gentle Shampoo & Conditioner score a 4. There are really good ingredients in both of these products however, the irritants are what makes the score high.I used both of them today, and my hair is super soft and shiny. Just know your ingredients. This is not designed for fine hair, however I do get psoriasis on my scalp. Sometimes, it being winter and the fact that it calmed it down I will continue to use it.Also, you’re not supposed to shampoo your hair every day. You can condition it every day, but not shampoo it. Just saying.So the bad reviews on this brand Im not sure why? As it is on the same level of $30 products with scores and ingredients such as Olapex scores a 6 for cancerous ingredients. I am not sure if I will purchase again. We’ll see how it goes.But it seems fairly good for the price! I am happy to try it for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You can’t beat this for the price
reviews.reviewText: Life changing, quite frankly. My hair has never been smoother and softer. And this is a THIRD of the price I was paying for Redken, and with BETTER results. I wish the pump put out more product because I have to pump like 5+ times to get enough shampoo out, but oh man, I’m a Monday believer. My hair is clean and soft! Smells good, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, manageable hair!
reviews.reviewText: Monday Smooth is a great shampoo by helping to control frizz and make you hair's appearance better overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought wrong one!!
reviews.reviewText: This product is excellent if you have dry or frizzy hair but I have very oily hair, which made my hair very greasy. I bought the right one and I am in love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this shampoo
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo is amazing. It makes my hair feel very soft after the wash. For the cheap price I love this thing. It is not a thick shampoo which is definitely a plus. It is a very light shampoo and it smells amazing. It is does not have a strong scent like a lot of other shampoos have. I definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bottom of the bottle was busted in the shipping bag that was left in mailbox. Delivery issue not product issue.The product is literally the only brand that my hair agrees with.
